sentences.english: Liu Yaohua was relieved from the post as Chief of the Bureau of Public Security of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 免去柳耀華新疆維吾爾自治區公安廳廳長職務。

sentences.english: All four cases are from Hotan Prefecture, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China.
sentences.chinese: 所有四個病例都來自中國新疆維吾爾自治區和田地區。

sentences.english: Wan Haichuan was appointed Member of Party Leadership Group of the People's Government of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 任命彎海川爲新疆維吾爾自治區人民政府黨組成員。

sentences.english: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region had not previously reported a human case.
sentences.chinese: 此前，新疆維吾爾自治區未報道有人間病例。
